import React from 'react' import { Nav, NavItem, NavLink } from 'reactstrap' import '../styles.css' interface DatasetInfo { label: string; value: string | number; } const Sidebar = ({ isOpen, onClose, dataset, totalUsers, selectedUsers, totalTime, }) => { const datasetInfo: DatasetInfo[] = [ { label: 'Dataset Name', value: dataset }, { label: 'Number of Users', value: `${selectedUsers} / ${totalUsers}` }, { label: 'Total Time', value: '1000 seconds' } ]; return ( isOpen && (
e.clientX > 250 && onClose()}>
